languages.text: Брошенные на Фолстоуне зловредным капитаном "Навиики", беженцы вынуждены были просить об укрытии суровых отшельников из Ордена Молота, почитающих святого Когнация.
Abandoned on Foulstone by the Naviica's detestable captain, the refugees were forced to seek shelter and appealed to the stern hermits from the Order of the Hammer, followers of Saint Cognatius.
languages.original_text: Брошенные на Фолстоуне зловредным капитаном "Навиики", беженцы вынуждены были просить об укрытии суровых отшельников из Ордена Молота, почитающих святого Когнация.

traits.locale_text: Abandoned on Foulstone by the Naviica's detestable captain, the refugees were forced to seek shelter and appealed to the stern hermits from the Order of the Hammer who worship Saint Cognatius.
Abandoned on Foulstone by the Naviica's detestable captain, the refugees were forced to seek shelter and appealed to the stern hermits from the Order of the Hammer who worship Saint Cognatius.

Abandoned on Foulstone by the Naviica's detestable captain, the refugees were forced to seek shelter and appealed to the stern hermits from the Order of the Hammer, followers of Saint Cognatius.

languages.text: 阴险的纳维卡号舰长将一群难民遗弃在了荒寂岩地。那些难民不得不寻找可以遮风挡雨的地方，祈求圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的追随者，重锤修会的隐士们对他们伸出援手。
languages.original_text: Abandoned on Foulstone by the Naviica's detestable captain, the refugees were forced to seek shelter and appealed to the stern hermits from the Order of the Hammer, followers of Saint Cognatius.

traits.locale_text: 阴险的纳维卡号舰长将一群难民遗弃在了荒寂岩地。那些难民不得不寻找可以遮风挡雨的地方，祈求圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的追随者，圣锤修会的隐士们对他们伸出援手。

languages.text: ナヴィーカ号の憎むべき船長によってファウルストーンに置き去りにされた難民たちは避難を余儀なくされ、聖コグナティウスの信奉者である鉄槌の修道会の厳格な隠者たちに陳情した。
languages.original_text: Abandoned on Foulstone by the Naviica's detestable captain, the refugees were forced to seek shelter and appealed to the stern hermits from the Order of the Hammer, followers of Saint Cognatius.

traits.locale_text: ナヴィーカ号の憎むべき船長によってファウルストーンに置き去りにされた難民たちは避難を余儀なくされ、聖コグナティウスの信奉者である鉄槌の修道会の厳格な隠者たちに陳情した。

languages.text: Abandonados en Rocainmunda por el aborrecible capitán de la Naviica, los refugiados se vieron obligados a buscar refugio y acudieron a los severos ermitaños de la Orden del Martillo, seguidores de san Cognatius.
languages.original_text: Abandoned on Foulstone by the Naviica's detestable captain, the refugees were forced to seek shelter and appealed to the stern hermits from the Order of the Hammer, followers of Saint Cognatius.

traits.locale_text: Abandonados en Rocainmunda por el aborrecible capitán de la Naviica, los refugiados se vieron obligados a buscar refugio y acudieron a los severos ermitaños de la Orden del Martillo, seguidores de san Cognatius.

languages.text: Die auf Foulstone vom abscheulichen Captain der Naviica zurückgelassenen Flüchtlinge mussten eine Zuflucht finden und wandten sich an die gestrengen Einsiedler des Ordens des Hammers, die ihrerseits Gefolgsleute von St. Cognatius sind.
languages.original_text: Abandoned on Foulstone by the Naviica's detestable captain, the refugees were forced to seek shelter and appealed to the stern hermits from the Order of the Hammer, followers of Saint Cognatius.

traits.locale_text: Die auf Foulstone vom abscheulichen Captain der Naviica zurückgelassenen Flüchtlinge mussten eine Zuflucht finden und wandten sich an die gestrengen Einsiedler des Ordens des Hammers, die ihrerseits Gefolgsleute von St. Cognatius sind.

languages.text: Abandonnés sur Rochepeste par l'ignoble capitaine du Naviica, les réfugiés n'ont eu d'autre choix que de chercher un abri et de faire appel aux ermites austères de l'Ordre du Marteau, des disciples de Saint Cognatius.
languages.original_text: Abandoned on Foulstone by the Naviica's detestable captain, the refugees were forced to seek shelter and appealed to the stern hermits from the Order of the Hammer, followers of Saint Cognatius.

traits.locale_text: Abandonnés sur Rochepeste par l'ignoble capitaine du Naviica, les réfugiés n'ont eu d'autre choix que de chercher un abri et de faire appel aux ermites austères de l'Ordre du Marteau, des disciples de Saint Cognatius.

languages.text: Naviica'nın aşağılık kaptanı tarafından Menfurtaş'ta terk edilen mülteciler, sığınabilecekleri bir yer aramak zorunda kalıp Aziz Cognatius'un takipçilerinden oluşan Çekiç Tarikatı'nın katı münzevilerinden medet umdu.
languages.original_text: Abandoned on Foulstone by the Naviica's detestable captain, the refugees were forced to seek shelter and appealed to the stern hermits from the Order of the Hammer, followers of Saint Cognatius.

traits.locale_text: Naviica'nın aşağılık kaptanı tarafından Menfurtaş'ta terk edilen mülteciler, sığınabilecekleri bir yer aramak zorunda kaldı ve Aziz Cognatius'un takipçisi Çekiç Tarikatı'nın katı münzevilerine yanaştı.
